mode.description: Computes the mode (most frequent value) of the input values.
mode.example: SELECT mode() WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY column) FROM table
mode.signature: mode() WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY anyelement) → anyelement

percentile_cont.description: Computes the continuous percentile of the input values.
percentile_cont.example: SELECT percentile_cont(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY column) FROM table
percentile_cont.signature: percentile_cont(fraction double precision) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY double precision) → double precision

percentile_cont.description: Computes the continuous percentile of the input values.
percentile_cont.example: SELECT percentile_cont(ARRAY[0.5, 0.9]) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY column) FROM table
percentile_cont.signature: percentile_cont(fractions double precision) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY interval) → interval

percentile_cont.example: SELECT percentile_cont(ARRAY[0.5, 0.9]) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY column) FROM table
percentile_cont.signature: percentile_cont(fractions double precision[]) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY double precision) → double precision[]

percentile_cont.example: SELECT percentile_cont(ARRAY[0.5, 0.9]) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY column) FROM table
percentile_cont.signature: percentile_cont(fractions double precision[]) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY interval) → interval[]

percentile_disc.description: Computes the discrete percentile of the input values.
percentile_disc.example: SELECT percentile_disc(0.5) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY column) FROM table
percentile_disc.signature: percentile_disc(fraction double precision) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY anyelement) → anyelement

percentile_disc.example: SELECT percentile_disc(ARRAY[0.5, 0.9]) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY column) FROM table
percentile_disc.signature: percentile_disc(fractions double precision[]) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY anyelement) → anyarray
